Title: Design of cloud-based and IPTV digital signage system
Affiliations: Information Technology, Putera Batam University, Batam, 29432, Indonesia; Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Maulana, A., Information Technology, Putera Batam University, Batam, 29432, Indonesia; Asfiyan, Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: The purpose of this research is to control, monitoring, and broadcast video, audio, text with digital signage system based on cloud and IPTV. It also provides multi content on one screen display included YouTube channel and RSS feed. Network connection transfer using internet protocol, the component of cloud-based and IPTV included with a content management system and a broadcast management system. Companies provide digital signage services are still using one of the ads in large size, this can alleviate the cost of advertising using digital signage. Therefore, the result is a designed from a display of how the content can be variatif when displayed on a digital signage as well through cloud-based and IPTV. © 2018 Universitas Ahmad Dahlan. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Broadcast management system; Cloud and IPTV; Content management system; Digital signage
References: Yim, J., Design of an IPTV-based digital signage system (2016) Int J Multimedia Ubiquitous Eng, 11 (4), pp. 36-125; Sugiura, K., Dayarathna, M., Withana, A., Design and implementation of distributed and scalable multimedia signage system (2010) Proceedings of the Second International Conference on Ubiquitous and Future Networks, Jeju, Korea, 16 (1), pp. 273-278; Yoon, C., Lee, H., Jeon, S., Lee, H., Mobile Digital Signage System based on Service Delivery Platform Location based Targeted Advertisement Service (2011) Proceedings of International Conference on ICT Convergence (ICTC), pp. 582-586. , Seoul Korea; Kusumarini, Y., de Yong, S., Thamrin, D., Signage System of Malls in Surabaya: Universal Interior Design Applications and Suggestions for Solution (2012) Procedia-Soc Behav Sci [Internet], 68, pp. 25-515; Kim, D., Chae, Y., Shin, J., Baek, U., Kim, S., Interactive mirror system based on personal purchase information (2013) Int J Softw Eng its Appl, 7 (3), pp. 42-333; Want, R., Schilit, B.N., Interactive Digital Signage (2012) IEEE Computer, 5, pp. 21-24; Bauer, C., Dohmen, P., Strauss, C., Interactive Digital Signage-An Innovative Service and Its Future Strategies Proceedings of the 2nd International Conference on Emerging Intelligent Data and Web Technologies
